remarks: The derivative of the Taylor polynomial is the Taylor polynomial of the derivative of the function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)
statement:
dvtaylp.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvtaylp.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
dvtaylp.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
dvtaylp.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvtaylp.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom ( ( S Dn F ) ` ( N + 1 ) ) ) $.
dvtaylp $p |- ( ph -> ( CC _D ( ( N + 1 ) ( S Tayl F ) B ) ) = ( N ( S Tayl ( S _D F ) ) B ) ) $.
